title: TALEN construct
description: Schema for submitting a TALEN construct.

name.title: Construct name
name.description: The name of the TALEN construct.

description.title: Description
description.description: A plain text description of the TALEN construct.

url.title: URL
url.description: An external resource with additional information about the construct.

vector_backbone_name.title: Backbone name
vector_backbone_name.description: The cloning vector used to make the construct. E.g. PEGFP (delGFP-TAL2-truncNLS)

RVD_sequence.title: RVD sequence
RVD_sequence.description: The repeat variable diresidue sequence. E.g. NI,NG,NI,HD,NG,NN,NG,NG,NN,HD,NI,NI,NI,NI,NM,HD,HD,NG

target_sequence.title: Target sequence
target_sequence.descrition: The target genome sequence recognized by the TALE domain.

talen_platform.title: TALEN platform
talen_platform.description: The TALEN platform used to make the construct. E.g. Golden Gate

target_genomic_coordinates.title: Target genomic coordinates
target_genomic_coordinates.description: Genomic coordinates where the TALEN cuts.

assembly.title: Genome assembly
assembly.description: The GRC genome assembly to which the target coordinates relate.  E.g. GRCh38

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the target chromosome. E.g. 1, 21, or X

end.title: End
end.description: The ending coordinate (possibly equal to the starting coordinate for one base.)

pairings.title: TALEN pairings
pairings.description: A list of possible pairings with other TALENs.

paired_with.title: Paired with
paired_with.description: Other member of the TALEN pair
paired_with.comment: See identifyingProperties in talen.json for valid identifiers

edit_type.title: Edit type
edit_type.description: The type of genomic modification for this pair.  E.g. insertion, deletion, edit

edited_genomic_coordinates.title: Edited genomic coordinates
edited_genomic_coordinates.description: Genomic coordinate range modified by this pair.

assembly.title: Genome assembly
assembly.description: The GRC genome assembly to which the target coordinates relate.  E.g. GRCh38

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the target chromosome. E.g. 1, 21, or X

end.title: End
end.description: The ending coordinate (possibly equal to the starting coordinate for one base.)

new_sequence.title: New sequence
new_sequence.description: For edits or inserts, the new or inserted sequence
